name: Snowkoban (Dillanhoyosmusic)
description:
Snowkoban

Snowkoban is a puzzle game built in response to the 2022 Global Game Jam addressing the theme of Duality. Our friendly snowman was out admiring the mountainside forest when... rumble! rumble! rumble! The mountain began to erupt!

It's up to you to help our snowman use the items he finds around him in the forest to make his way out of the lava maze. You are our only hope!

Here is our Global Game jam Submission page Global Game Jam Snowkoban

Team:

Dillan Hoyos: Sound Designer/Musician/Game Designer Game Audio Portfolio

Erbol Bekzat: Unity Programmer Instagram: kirpiillustartations

Micah Gideon: Programmer/ UI/UX  Instructional and Software Designer

Assets used:

Art, Music, SFX and Code was made by our team. Built in Unity with Wwise implementation.
